articles.description: Jamaal King scored 26 points and Keith Braxton had 23 points to go with 14 rebounds as Saint Francis outlasted Central Connecticut 77-71 in overtime after blowing a 16-point lead on Thursday night.
articles.headline: King and Braxton combine to lead Red Flash to overtime win

articles.description: David Nichols scored 25 points, 19 in the second half, leading five into double figures and Albany defeated UMass Lowell 91-81 Thursday night, notching its fourth straight 20-win season.
articles.headline: Nichols leads Albany past UMass Lowell 91-81

articles.description: Isaiah Washington's layup with seven seconds remaining lifted Quinnipiac to a 71-70 victory over Manhattan on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Washington's bucket wins it for Quinnipiac 71-70

articles.description: Josh Reaves feeds Mike Watkins, who gets behind the defense for an alley-oop dunk.
articles.headline: Watkins slips backdoor for alley-oop

images.caption: Josh Reaves feeds Mike Watkins, who gets behind the defense for an alley-oop dunk.
images.name: Watkins slips backdoor for alley-oop

articles.description: Rasheem Dunn scored 24 and hit a go-ahead layup late and St. Francis (Brooklyn) sank 5 of 6 free throws in the final 33 seconds to hold off LIU Brooklyn 84-79 on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Dunn rallies St Francis to 84-79 win over LIU Brooklyn

articles.description: Jason Dunne scored 19 points with four 3-pointers and nine rebounds, J.R. Lynch scored 13 points and made four free throws in the final 16 seconds, and Hartford beat Maine 67-63 on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Lynch's free throws help Hartford down Maine 67-63
